eligibility:
Master’s in Public Policy serves as an interdisciplinary programme to equip the decision makers of tomorrow with the skills and tools they need to build sustainable solutions to social problems, critically assess policy innovations and create meaningful change in the world around them. The programme has a hands-on approach thrusting students into the forefront to lead the transformation and be change agents to India’s various social issues while also arming them with a global outlook. Students will have exposure to and be supported by key institutions such as UNITAR, World Bank, and NITI Aayog along with corporates deeply invested in social responsibility
